=== 3.1.4 ===
- Set file.name to full S3 path when saving in S3

=== 3.1.0 ===
- All templates moved into psu_upload directory
- Reorganized psu_base templates

=== 3.0.4 ===
- Added DatabaseFile model to admin interface

=== 3.0.3 ===
- Process file names the same way for S3 and database storage

=== 3.0.1 ===
- All templates moved into psu/upload directory
- Templates renamed and/or split into multiple templates (_dnd_*.*)
- Retain original file name and type when resizing an image

=== 2.0.3 ===
- Skip file content check when importing from existing database (ie petition docs from Banner database)

=== 2.0.2 ===
- Handle file extension difference when OpenOffice doc is saved as a Word doc

=== 2.0.1 ===
- JS function to resize images prior to upload
- _js_styles.html renamed to _js_assets.html

=== 1.1.1 ===
- Handle error when an image that was just deleted is rendered via {%file_preview%}
- Example template: _dnd_input.html

=== 1.1.0 ===
- Moved demo views and templates from plugin to demo app
- View for displaying a file requires permissions or file ID saved in session
- Template tag for linking to files with preview of images
- As in prev version, Use < 1.0.0 for deployed apps using S3 until tested in Stage

=== 1.0.2 ===
- Handle uploading documents to database
- Use database uploads during development, even for apps using S3 storage
  Deployed S3 functionality should be the same, but has not been tested.
  Use version < 1.0.0 for deployed apps using S3 until tested in Stage

=== 0.2.6 ===
- Log errors that occur when reading an uploaded file to a string

=== 0.2.4 ===
- CSV files not always matching their extensions
- Update boto dependency

=== 0.2.3 ===
- CSV saved in Excel may have Excel mime-type

=== 0.2.2 ===
- Added upload_service funtions for reading uploaded files without saving them anywhere

=== 0.2.0 ===
- Updated requirements with new versions

=== 0.1.1 ===
- Updated requirements and logging
- Register UplaodedFile model in admin pages

=== 0.1.0 ===
- Use python-magic to validate actual content type of files

=== 0.0.8 ===
- Fields to link to an external model
- Upload service returns UploadedFiles rather than file path strings

=== 0.0.5 ===
- file_link taglib allows you to speficy original or current file name

=== 0.0.3 ===
- Added tag, status, and original_name to model
- Added file retrieval service
- Updated PSU Base requirement

=== 0.0.2 ===
- S3 storage path must include enviromment as well as app name ('APP/ENV/the-file.txt')

=== 0.0.1 ===
- Initial Release
